attributes.action: we need the labour party to start a vote of no confidence,
attributes.additional_details:
we neded the Labour party to start a vote of no confidence in light of recent Tory actions, against the civilian people of syria.

if we can get this to 100K plus as law requires then the commons would have to at least look at it and the wil
attributes.background:
Prime Minister Theresa May makes a statement and takes press questions after the UK launched airstrikes on Syria in a joint attack on Syrian targets with the USA and France.

with out consulting parlment

rejection.details:
This petition is calling on the Labour party, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

In any case, we can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.
